tip2: • Avoid using birth dates or phone numbers

tip_1: •  Never share your UPI PIN with anyone
tip_2: •  Use a unique PIN that's easy to remember
credit_upi_banner:
NO CREDIT CARD, NO WORRIES
 GET CREDIT THROUGH CREDIT UPI
credit_upi_subtitle: Pay using your Credit Card on UPI
credit_upi_status_subtitle: Manage your Credit UPI enabled bank accounts and enjoy seamless credit-based payments
credit_upi_not_activated: Credit UPI not activated for this account
about_credit_upi_sub: Credit UPI allows you to make payments using your pre-approved credit line instead of your bank balance. Enjoy instant credit with seamless UPI payments.
activate_credit_upi_desc: Would you like to activate your Credit UPI service?
bottom_info: We need to collect some additional information to complete your activation
otp_instruction: Enter the 6-digit OTP sent to your registered mobile number to activate your Credit UPI and check your CIBIL score
terms_condition: By proceeding, you agree to our Terms & Conditions and authorize CIBIL score check

security_message: Set up your Credit UPI PIN to start making secure payments
please_wait: Please wait while we complete the setup
upi_loading_message: Do not close or refresh the app while we are setting up your Credit UPI.
upi_pin_description: Create a secure 4-digit PIN for your Credit UPI transactions. This PIN will be required for all credit-based UPI payments.
upi_security_note: This PIN will be used to authorize credit-based UPI payments and transactions
upi_desc: Seamless UPI payments with monthly bill, powered by NBFC.
credit_upi_terms_title: Before you activate Credit UPI, please review and agree to the terms.
credit_upi_terms_1: Credit UPI is powered by NBFC in partnership with 3D Global Payments
credit_upi_terms_2: Repayments to be made monthly as per billing cycle
credit_upi_terms_3: Interest / charges (if any) will be shown clearly in the app
credit_upi_terms_4: Your credit profile will be checked securely
credit_upi_terms_5: Late payments may impact your credit score
